#labels Featured
This is a short guide to get you up and running with the Honeybread theme.

= Installation Instructions =
== Initial Installation ==
# Download the Honeybread APK
# Install the APK
# Open the Theme Chooser app
# Select the Honeybread theme
# After it applies, reboot
# Enjoy!

== Update Instructions ==
# Open the Theme Chooser
# Apply Stock Theme
# Download the updated APK
# Install the updated APK
# Open Theme Chooser
# Select Honeybread
# After it applies, reboot
# Enjoy!
